scripts.deploy-test: npm run build:test; firebase deploy --project laa-dashboard-test
scripts.deploy-prod-int: npm run build:prod-int; firebase deploy --project laa-dashboard-int
scripts.deploy-prod-ext: npm run build:prod-ext; firebase deploy --project laa-dashboard
scripts.init: firebase use laa-dashboard-test; firebase database:set /services services.json -y
